text: Can anybody confirm that there's still no way to do multi-language content in the HubSpot staging area?
My client is already on HubSpot and looking to do a redesign and I think that's going to be a barrier for them.

you cant create another language of a page in staging, however you could either create the additional language as its own page and link them after you push them live. Or create the pages in your live pages section (but leave unpublished), and link them up accordingly and then stage them to create the content. You can stage the multi-language pages, you just cant create them in staging.
As far as I'm aware this is (unfortunately) still the case
